Review.Contenu: I received my Torres case for my iPhone 17 Plus pro and I was unable use any of side buttons with the case on. I notified Torres and received a replacement case. Even with the exchange the side buttons on the case  wouldn’t activate the iPhone button function.

Review.Titre: The back mag safe stand is not attached…
Review.Contenu: The back mag safe stand is not attached - its a stick on - difficult to get it straight - prevented my mag safe charger from working.  Worthless case
Received incorrect product. Took weeks for correct product to be shipped and we never received. We have no product and no refund.

I placed an order for two iPhone 14 protectors, and after a long delay, I finally received the package with anticipation. However, I was surprised to find that only one piece was included in the package. On November 25th, the day I received the parcel, I took some photos and sent them via email to mall@torraslife Unfortunately, I have not received a response up to this date.

Review.Contenu: Unfortunately the phone case that came in was not was  expected and didn't even fit the phone I have.   I don't have time to send this back for a return and I am just going to chalk it up as a loss and look for another type of case.  Thank you but just wasn't the best experience.

Review.Titre: I bought an Iphone 15 case from them
Review.Contenu: I bought an Iphone 15 case from them. Never shipped. They said they were short on stock and ship within 5 days but never happened. In 3 weeks the tracking status was still at „parcel information received“ in china. Requested a refund because that‘s a joke.

Review.Titre: Ordered a Coolify3 and it never…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a Coolify3 and it never arrived, in fact, there was NO MOVEMENT on the tracking for 10 days....I believe Torras didn't even despatch my order....I had to open up a dispute on PayPal... Received a full refund, but now without a cooler which would have helped ease a medical condition I have....I would rather go without than trust Torras with future orders...I would personally steer clear and look elsewhere to buy!!UPDATE...I have since discovered the APP, at least for now, can only be used in either the US or Japan...I reside in the UK, so will be unable to use it until Torras addresses this, so beware if you're considering purchasing..
Nothing more than a Alibaba dropshipper! Same kind of service as well… Order direct from Amazon or buy something from Apple.

Company makes False Claims. Only answers messages and emails selectively. When they do reply to your messages, it is 2 or 3 days later and as an update to your order on their website. Claimed was shipping from US warehouse only to get an international tax bill and still don't have my product 2 weeks later!!!

I recieved the package, but i ordered 3 x iPhone 14 Pro GlassGo Diamonds Screen Protectors, but only recieved 1 screen protector. I have been writing to their support mail several times with no luck, they are just ghosting me. It's been over a month and not a single mail returned from Torraslife.DON'T BUY FROM THEM!!

Ordered a iPhone 12 case on 5th of october. Still yet to arrive and given a tracking number that doesnt work. Was told it was in transit and set to arrive before 8pm yesterday and now it just says in transit with no arrival date.

Review.Titre: the phone case doesn't line up the…
Review.Contenu: the phone case doesn't line up the buttons on the right hand side of my phone.  Therefore the case is no good.

Review.Titre: Does not work with induction charging…
Review.Contenu: Does not work with induction charging pads in my car.

Review.Titre: Order from Amazon instead of torraslife
Review.Contenu: If you choose to order stuff from them, order through Amazon, not torraslife. Bought their neck AC, did not receive any order confirmation or any shipping/tracking info. Tried contacting them but didn't get any response.Still figuring out if I'm still going to receive this product or get sent a refund with PayPal.

Its an ok case. Pros are the rotating kickstand. I use it all the time. Cons are the edge of the case near the screen bumps up too high so it’s sometimes hard to use the screen close to the edge. 2 im not hard on my kickstand but after 3 months of use it seems to not want to close all the way. 3 the color is wearing off the kickstand and buttons. 4 the back isnt as transparent as the pictures on the website.
Pretty pleased with it initially, but after about six weeks of daily usage, the ring doesn't sit flush and the hinge starts to get loose.
Delivery time is too long, exceed 14days maximum as the web posts. Order day 5th Nov, today 24th Nov (19days already) but not receive the product yet...

Does what it says, protects phone, also a phone stand In numerous positions. The holding the metal loop with your fingers is probably not a good idea as the metal ring is very thin but does bite into your fingers pretty fast and can be painful after a minute or so. That’s said it definitely worth the money!
Great product. The quality of Torras. Easy to align privacy screen protector with alignment tool and accessories.

Review.Titre: Doesn't charge wirelessly bc stand doesn’t lie flush on case
Review.Contenu: I like the stand and the ring can be helpful when holding the iPhone 15 Pro Max. However it does not charge on MagSafe devices with the case on.

Review.Titre: I ordered a screen protector 13 days…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a screen protector 13 days ago and still haven’t received it…Update : Got a full refund and i can keep the product when it arrives. If you plan on purchasing directly from the Torras website, order at least 1 month in advance. I will make a second update when the product arrives but the support has been great.

Good quality.Nice Color. (Green).  An eye-catcher.People want to touch it.But … The customs took my package … and I had to pay 21€ extra to get my package.   So … I paid 76€ for my TORRAS totally.So, It’s not good to buy from Europe … (Belgium) and better to buy an original (boring) Apple-case in our local shop.It’s Very expensive to want something Nice.I don’t blame You , it was a Lesson for me.

Review.Titre: I ordered two phone cases 3 weeks ago
Review.Contenu: Product is really good and as described.  Had an issue with delivery as it took 3 weeks, but they gave me a discount and a free screen cover as an apology, due to issues with low stock.  Would give 5 stars for the product, but was disappointed with the delivery time.

Review.Titre: Some fingerprints, the rest is excellent!
Review.Contenu: It took ages until the product arrived. But the support was very good. I liked how easy it was to mount the screenprotector. This part is excellent. 1 Star less because of the fingerprints which are not avoidable. But overall I‘m happy with the product!

Review.Titre: I like Torras but order carefully
Review.Contenu: I needed a protective case for a new iPhone 15. Briefly, I ordered the wrong item (for iPhone 15 Pro vs iPhone 15). I realized my error when the fit was slightly off, so I asked about a return. Instead they offered to send me free a replacement, but it turns out Torras does not make that item ("Lstand") for the iPhone 15 (non-Pro). They sent me the same Lstand plus another one that also didn't fit. I wrote a long email explaining everything and then they sent the Ostand which is the next level up, for free, which does fit and I love it.  Their attitude for making the customer happy was 5-stars, and the product is 5-stars, but they lose one point for not knowing their own product line and for not thinking the first time about what they were sending.

Pros: Great case. Love the look. Feels good in the hand. Protective yet thin enough. The stand is a nice touch incorporating the MagSafe look. Works really well with all of my MagSafe chargers. Holds firm but easily removes from them. Buttons feel very nice. Made of aluminum? I chose the black case to go with my blue iPhone 15 Pro Max. Cons: Case is a bit slippery, Could use molded grips on sides. Maybe some slash indents built into the bumper? Stand doesnt angle enough for me to sit it on desk and look right at it. The ceiling lights reflect off of the phone face due to this. Buttons stick out too far. You will often will press them just by holding the phone or laying on its side using the kickstand. I've accidentally taken many screenshots due to this.I think this phone case could be everything I wanted if these issues were addressed. However, I'm keeping it as the pros outweigh the cons for sure.
The delivery took too long but their customer service was impeccable after I told them I had received the wrong case. They sent it for free and quickly.  Bravo!

Updated 19/12/2023 from 2 -> 4 stars.BUT PAY ATTENTION OF CUSTOMER TOLD Based on Torras respond below i did send them an email. We agreed that they would credit the first order and send me a new cover which they did. The cover it self are again a nice version that i actually will use going forward. BUT it still was a very long wait/shipping process AND i had to pay additional custom fee (same pris as a new standard cover in Denmark) why you need to order quit some covers before at can be justified. Due to thier customer service i update numbers of stars but cant see that it will make sense for EU customers.  _________I ordered an cover to my iphone14 which I received but they sent it for an MAX that is way to big for my iphone. Also I payed custom fee as I didn’t noticed they was located in China. So the price doubled.  I sent an message trough thier website but didn’t get any reply, sent an email with no reply and latest an messenger message still without recieving any feedback. Only reason why not 1 star is that the cover it self are more or less as expected.
Very good case. My order did take a little long to ship.
Please improve the transportation and provide estimated arrival date, that will be great
Amazing case! Slow delivery to Sweden.
Customer service

OléNo nonsense case that delivers. I got the clear so that I could see the phone I bought and paid for. Love the unobtrusive and extremely handy ring at the rear. Great stand, holder and very flexible in how you use it. Everything fits the way it should and I am particularly happy with the choice of colours for the action buttons: silver, green, orange and black. I’ve chosen the orange for all of the buttons, except the action button, which I’ve kept Silver. I love having the choice. Well done.We will attach the 'verified buyer' badge because this review results directly from one of our review requests.

The ring is what (obviously) separates the Torras from other cases but would it last? So far, mine has lived up to the hype. However, I haven't sat on it/stepped on it etc. where the hinge might be compromised. The case is good, all buttons easily accessible, no complaints, bounces the way it should on short drops, but again nothing traumatic has occurred.

Review.Titre: I ordered this case and it ended up…
Review.Contenu: I ordered this case and it ended up being the wrong phone and wouldn’t fit. I contacted the company to see if I could get an exchange and they just sent me the right case with no additional charge so I got to give away the other case. The customer service was incredible and the case is amazing especially for the price. I will never go back to big brands like otterbox again.
Great quality products!Great customer service!Fast action when there is problem with your orders.

The ordering process was super easy, shipping was very quick and their website was very easy to navigate. This company makes quality products and their customer service is excellent.absolutely love this phone case, it’s very comfortable to hold and use, extremely durable and protective. The MagSafe ring stand is genius and works perfectly and I love how strong the magnets are. Highly recommend this brand.

It’s the first time I’m buying from the Torras site and it was a wonderful experience. They followed up the entire shipping process and even made a personalized shipping experience since I’m a Brazilian customer and “Brazil” wasn’t immediately available in the shipping destination selector.They even gone a step further, notifying me of the customs charge in the same they it was posted. So if I had missed that, it could have been solved even faster then it would be waiting for the oficial notification.The iPhone case I purchased came as wonderfully as described. Even thinner than expected and very protective.

This is the first case I’ve had that allows me to have a kickstand,  way to keep a hold of my iPhone—which limits the risk of dropping it—and a small wallet on the phone. I use a magnetic slim wall at and it connects to the case nicely. I love it. I used my phone on a very windy vacation and felt at ease that I could hold on to the ring and it wouldn’t blow away.

I love this case! I had been looking for a MagSafe case that also provided a grip/kickstand and this is perfect! The customizable metallic buttons got my attention, and the rotatable, flip-out, magnetic ring sealed the deal.
Great design and tough. Have accidentally dropped phone several times and not a scratch! Screen protector was amazingly easy to install. Torres makes a great product. Customer service great too.

Customer service was very responsive and helpful in resolving and order issue. I purchased the wrong version of case for my phone and customer service helped me get the correct version. I have purchased a few cases over the years with Torras. I am very satisfied with the quality of the case.
Fits great, looks professional, slim enough to go in your pocket, but substantial enough to protect the phone. The magnet is handy in many situations beyond just charging.
Case has a great feel in hand and does not slip easily. Ostand is high quality and makes for a perfect stand.
The case looks really great on the phone, provides good protection, and is comfortable to hold.
Delivery was faster than I had expected. Also case is holding up well, couple drops and has kept phone unscathed. Also the the ability to swivel the stand any direction.
Great customer service, had issue with the case i was sent for the fold 5, communication regarding replacement was top notch, they intiated a replacement after confirming details of the issue.

Review.Titre: I had purchased the skinny case for my…
Review.Contenu: I had purchased the skinny case for my IPhone 15 Pro Max but the buttons didn’t work so I contacted customer support and let me tell you Mr. Iman went over and beyond to hell me with my problem and in less than 3 days I had my new case and it was a perfect fit even stayed in contact to make sure I received it and it fit, I just love Torras Cases and recommend I recommend them on a 100% thank you so much my number 1 case choice for my IPhone.

Review.Titre: A+++++ 5 Stars - New Torras fan here for sure
Review.Contenu: The quality of the case is great, every button nicely covered, feels sturdy without being bulky and the stand works really well. The screen protectors are genuinely the best I've ever had. The screen protector comes with its own guiding unit and accessories to make it super easy to get on but also makes sure it is clean. Considering the items were shipped from China it was really very quick. It took 1 week for my items to arrive and I'd wait that every time for this quality of product.I am a Torras fan for sure and can say with confidence that this has got to be the best phone case brand I've ever purchased from. Go Torras! Love it.
Excellent quality, very lightweight, great features! Love Torres products!

Review.Titre: Well made, very light and sticks to metal surfaces
Review.Contenu: I saw the ad on instagram and figured I’d give it a shot. What attracted me to it was the fact that it has a built in ring/stand that moved in any direction so you can easily set your phone up to watch anything. In addition, the ring is magnetized so it sticks to any metal surfaces which is exactly what I was looking for.  Shipping was fast price was very reasonable.

Phone Case is perfect. Great quality. Love the slim design and functionality. Exactly what I wanted. Shipping is a little slow, so be patient. Customer service responded quickly and helped me resolve issue with tracking number.

I ordered it a set of screen protectors for my iPhone 15 Pro Max. When I received them they were better than I expected and very easy to install. We decided to order another set for our daughter. When I ordered this set I ordered the wrong ones. They are sending me a new set of free of charge, plus I get to give away the ones I accidentally ordered, and they're giving me a five dollar discount for the troubles. I screwed up and they rewarding me for it. Now that's customer service.We will attach the 'verified buyer' badge to this web review once (s)he confirms her/his email, because we found an order from Gavin Boone in your order history.

Review.Titre: The ONLY screen protector to buy!
Review.Contenu: Excellent screen protector and the simple, easy way to fit it was brilliant in its simplicity. No mistakes no messing around getting everything right just fit the surround and pull the “tab” and all done. Highly recommend these for the best fit.
Smooth transaction, but a bit slow delivery from overseas, taking about 2 weeks to received but overall i really enjoy the product. 5 stars for the case, grip and really premium to hold.
Perfect design,fits my phone perfectly, easy application and great quality.

Review.Titre: Arrived promptly and in good shape
Review.Contenu: Arrived promptly and in good shape.  Made a fun Christmas gift.

Review.Contenu: I like the case and the mag safe would be nice to customize a case but over all great case
Super product with great customer service

Great product, easy to install, quick delivery.-GM
Solid product.  One of the better iPhone cases on the market.  Very sturdy.

Well-made, as expected. I would buy another one.

I like the fit, feel, and protection of the Torras iPhone 15 max phone cases.
Great support, great covers!
Very well made and satisfied with the quality of the product.
Great product. Great customer service. You won’t be disappointed.
Quick shipping, thoughtful design and instructions made application so easy and effective. I highly recommend!
Great, sturdy case, stylish and a good grip.
I love the case. Thin and has great non-slip texture.
Great quality and amazing customer service.
Excellent case! Best case ever
